author: Collier Meyerson
title: Doulas Are Going Virtual
description: Doulas are getting creative to help their clients in a time of social distancing.
content: The day before her due date, Sarah Pitmans doctor called, urging her to go in for an induction. NY Presbyterian, the Manhattan hospital where she was delivering, would begin banning partners from entering the maternity ward as a precaution against COVID-19. I… [+6423 chars]
